reviewText: This video of V.S. Ramachandran discusses brain function.  It is a very understandable explanation of higher level theory regarding some mysteries of the brain including the recent theory built around "Mirror Neurons".  This simply opens the doors for your consideration about a myriad of applications...from development and learning & cognition to stroke recovery and therapies for regaining function following brain damage.  This exceptional interview is one that will beg you to ask questions and satisfy a desire to learn more as this only scratches the surface of a fascinating field that touches everyone.
